column4: What can i do to be more proficient with this? I feel lost.  I don't understand any of the greek commands.   I was GREAT with Dos back in the day.  I understand command lines and stuff. but none of this makes any sense.
Compiz? XGL? What are these?  how do I instal them..  man. i'm so lost. LOL
Is gutsy going to be the full release of 7.04?
very much so.  You can also ask in #ubuntu-effects
You can upgrade, like all ubuntu versions
